=== About Me ===

Hello! 

I am David Guerrero, Telecommunications Engineering student at Universidad de Antioquia. I am from <nowiki>[[http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramiriqui|Ramiriquí, Boyacá|target="_blank"]]</nowiki>, but I live and study in Medellín. 

I have been GNU/Linux user since 2010, Joined Ubuntu-CO LoCo Team in 2012 and actively participate in it.

I'm interested in Networking and Data Infrastructure, and working towards the LPIC certification. Certified MTA Networking Fundamentals 2017 (not everything can be perfect)
